name: Chef John
description: Chef John is a culinary expert with 10 years of experience. He has created 50 delicious recipes and gained 500 likes for his amazing creations.

ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into small cubes
recife_info.cooking_method:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, hoisin sauce, cornstarch, red pepper flakes, and chicken broth. Set aside.

2. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.

3. Add chicken cubes to the pan and season with salt and pepper. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.

4. In the same pan, add peanuts and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until lightly toasted. Remove from the pan and set aside.

5. Add diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell peppers to the pan. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are crisp-tender.

6.
